name: Blob Buster
description:
Luke is dropped into a lair of gooey gremlins, oozing obstacles, slithering slugs, with the mission of painting every wall in the slime's nest red! And pink. And green. And whatever other hue of slime dwells down there. How long can you survive?

A game I made for FattyDragonite on occasion of his 23rd birthday! He's the best brother in the world~

Features:
-An endless action-laden beat-'em-up with a progressive difficulty ramp;
-XP points system that can be spent on a myriad of weapon and character upgrades;
-Bouncing belly physics on Luke when running!
-Configurable loadout featuring five different secondary weapons to choose from! Will you blast slimes into a heap of sludge with the Master Blaster, or obliterate them into nothingness with the Echo Mines?
-Only available in English, sorry! I made this game in a VERY short timespan, which left me with no time to translate. I might add translations in the future though!
-Happy birthday, Luke!
